name: ROYHLE AVIATION ACADEMY, INC
about: Royhle Aviation Academy Inc. is a certified flight training school approved by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP). We offer high-quality pilot training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), Instrument Flight Rules (IFR), and Multi-Engine ratings. Our academy is committed to providing professional and comprehensive aviation education, ensuring students are well-prepared for a successful career in aviation. With a focus on safety, excellence, and student success, Royhle Aviation Academy is a trusted institution for aspiring pilots in the Philippines. We strive to foster a supportive and innovative learning environment that meets the highest standards of aviation training.
